Identification.LongTitle: Order Designating the National Transportation Act Review Commission as a Department and the Prime Minister as Appropriate Minister

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, is pleased hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph (b) of the definition department in section 2 of the Financial Administration Act, to designate the National Transportation Act Review Commission as a department for the purposes of that Act; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph (b) of the definition appropriate Minister in section 2 of the Financial Administration Act, to designate the Prime Minister as the appropriate Minister with respect to the National Transportation Act Review Commission.
